name: Crazy Chewy
overview: Very first released game for CreatiVision. The game (a Pac-Man clone) was originally called Crazy Pucker and soon retired from market likely due to copyright worries. It was then re-issued as Crazy Chewy and Crazy Moonie. Then again retired from market and re-issued as Crazy Chicky (with changed graphics and gameplay). The object of the game is to control the motion of Crazy Chewy to eat up as many beans as possible. There are four monsters who will capture the chewy on contact. You have to maneuver the motion of the chewy to get away from the monsters and eat up the beans.
